item.title: L4 - Solving Quadratic Equations
item.description: 3 Solutions of a Quadratic Equation When we solve an equation, we are trying to to find the values of x that make MG = MD. For a quadratic function, this means the values of x that render the equation equal to 0.

item.title: L5 - Determining Quadratic Equation with intercepts
L6 - System of Equations
item.description: What is a system of equations? A system of functions is composed of functions that share the same variables. Solving systems of equations Substitution or elimination Factorize and solve for x Substitute x and solve for y values .
